meanings.definition: The ability to produce original and imaginative ideas.
meanings.sent1: Her creativity shone through in her unique artwork.
meanings.sent2: I admire her creativity in coming up with new solutions.
meanings.sent3: His creativity in making up stories always entertained us.
meanings.sent4: The creativity of nature never fails to inspire me.
meanings.sent5: The child's creativity knew no bounds as she painted the world in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The use of imagination or original ideas to create something.
meanings.sent1: The creativity of the chef was evident in the delicious dish.
meanings.sent2: Music is a form of creativity that touches the soul.
meanings.sent3: His creativity in building sandcastles amazed everyone at the beach.
meanings.sent4: The creativity of the architect transformed the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: The writer's creativity brought the characters to life on the pages.

meanings.sent3: His creativity in organizing events made him popular among friends.
meanings.sent4: The creativity of the designer was evident in every detail of the dress.
